title: replace TestSolrQueryResponse.testReturnFields's SolrReturnFields.toString use
description: replace TestSolrQueryResponse.testReturnFields's SolrReturnFields.toString use in favour of a (not yet existing) SolrReturnFields.equals method. this is because SolrReturnFields contains sets and equal return fields could have differing toString() representations.

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content: Not actively looking at this, so unassigning myself in case anyone else would like to have a go.
